questions.question: In the the case of defibrillator, a double square pulse type is used to

answers.a: restart the heart rhythm after the open heart surgery
answers.c: arrest leakage of blood from the heart
answers.d: arrest the reverse flow of blood from ventricle to atrium

questions.question: In direct current defibrillator, a pulse with a duration of about 5 ms is generated by means of a
The energy produced by defibrillator is

answers.d: higher for persons having enormous weight

questions.question: One of the following properties is the characteristic of metals when they are used as implant materials. What is it?
